name: OutboundShipment
description: Stores shipment information for outbound orders, including ship date, product, quantity, ship from site, expected delivery date, and actual delivery date.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Referred by other objects as 'shipment_id' unless explicitly stated

fields.name: connection_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the data source (i.e. connection). Auto populated by Galaxy.

fields.name: cust_order_id
fields.description: ID of customer order

fields.name: cust_order_line_id
fields.description: Line ID of customer order

fields.name: shipped_qty
fields.description: Quantity shipped from company to customer. In same UOM as order

fields.name: cust_shipment_status
fields.description:
Reserved' values for [Galaxy] 2022: 
"Cancelled" (populated in SAP mapping; also used for deleted)
"Open" (not populated in SAP mapping)
"Closed" (not populated in SAP mapping)
"InTransit" (not populated in SAP mapping)
"Delivered" (not populated in SAP mapping)
"": Null is also acceptable; 
Usage is determined by apps and customers
Customers can also populate their own values.

fields.name: expected_ship_date
fields.description: Date product was expected to ship from company location

fields.name: actual_ship_date
fields.description: Date product was actually shipped from company location

fields.name: from_site_id
fields.description: Site/warehouse where product shipped from

fields.name: to_site_id
fields.description: Destination site ID for outbound shipments; not expected to match to this company's side_id (as this order is going outside company network).

fields.name: expected_delivery_date
fields.description: Date when product was expected to be delivered at customer location

fields.name: actual_delivery_date
fields.description: Date when product was actually delivered at customer location

fields.name: shipping_cost
fields.description: Final shipping cost

fields.name: tracking_number
fields.description: Tracking number associated with shipment

fields.name: bill_weight
fields.description: Shipped weight of product used for billing

fields.name: db_creation_dttm
fields.description: Internal audit field - stores when the record was created

fields.name: db_updation_dttm
fields.description: Internal audit field - stores when the record was last updated

fields.name: sap_2lis_08trtlp__vbeln
fields.description: Delivery Number. Predicate key for SAP mapping. Upsert key for 2LIS_12_VCITM

fields.name: sap_2lis_08trtlp__posnr
fields.description: Delivery Item Number. Predicate key for SAP mapping. Upsert key for 2LIS_12_VCITM

fields.name: sap_2lis_08trtlp__tknum
fields.description: Shipment Item Number. Predicate key for SAP mapping. Upsert key for 2LIS_08TRTK
